titleStmt.title: Receipt for tax on pigeon-houses (trite peristeronon)
titleStmt.author: Ptolemaios

revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: The 19th year, Epeiph 2. By ï¿½ Paid into the bank at Krokodilon polis to Ptolemaios, banker, for the king, by Kleon son of Nikomachos, for the tax of a third on pigeon-houses at Oxyrhyncha, for the 19th year, one thousand drachmas of bronze at a discount, total 1000 dr. (2nd hand) The 19th year, Epeiph 2. In the presence of N.N., agent of the basilikos grammateus, one thousand drachmas of bronze at a discount, total 1000 dr. (3rd hand) The 19th year, Epeiph 2. In the presence of Chairemon, agent of the oikonomos, 1000 drachmas of bronze at a discount, total 1000 dr.
